cause.description:
InterVarsity Christian Fellowship/USA® is an evangelical campus mission serving more than 35,000 students and faculty on more than 560 college and university campuses nationwide. Incorporated in 1941, InterVarsity has a rich tradition of campus witness, thoughtful discipleship, and a concern for world missions.
1. IVCF/USA is called to the University to be a redeeming influence among its people, ideas and structures.
2. IVCF/USA promotes authentic relationships and redemptive communities marked by God's grace and truth.
3. IVCF/USA proclaims Jesus as Lord over all creation and culture, and seeks to serve God and partner with His people to extend His kingdom cross-culturally on campus and around the world.
cause.mission: The vision of IVCF/USA is to see students and faculty transformed, campuses renewed, and world changers developed.
cause.name: InterVarsity Christian Fellowship/USA®
